Summary: Biochemical reaction from 4'-hydroxyclobazam to 4'-hydroxy-n-desmethylclobazam. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP3A4 or CYP2C9.
Biochemical reaction from clobazam to norclobazam. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP2C19 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from clobazam to 4'-hydroxyclobazam. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C19 or CYP2C18.
Biochemical reaction from norclobazam to 4'-hydroxy-n-desmethylclobazam. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C19 or CYP2C18.
norclobazam leads to Benzodiazepine Pathway, Pharmacodynamics.
clobazam leads to Benzodiazepine Pathway, Pharmacodynamics.
